channel.title: How do I change how much xp you get?
channel.description: I am using the Deltascape source and I want to increase the xp and how fast I lvl. I think it is somethin to do with how much xp the monsters give. Can someone help me?

item.title: How do I change how much xp you get?
item.dc:creator: @Retard_Monkey Retard Monkey
item.description:
@Retard_Monkey wrote:

Deltascape and Dodian sources aren’t supposed to be fast 99s… That was the point of them. They are stable, slightly more realistic servers.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change how much xp you get?

item.title: How do I change how much xp you get?
item.dc:creator: @i_nelson_i i nelson i
item.description:
@i_nelson_i wrote:

naa go into player.java search xp and change to what you want so xprate - 5 <-- 5 is the best 1 is lowest[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 20, 2008, 10:36:48 am[/size][hr]sos go into player.java and search public int CombatExpRate = 1; and change the 1 to 1-5 <------> 1 lowest 5 highest

Read full topic
